pasugiya dinaka siduwu pasal sisuwekuge atha kandin wenwime sochaniya puwathath samaga kuliyapitiya mulastana polis parikshaka sujiwa wijesena mahathage maga penwima matha rathawahana sthanadhipathi bandhula thennakon mahatha athulath kandayamak methek digin digatama sisun basrathawala aparikshakariwa sisun prawahanaya karana basratha nawatha nithiya kriyathmaka karamin pitupasa dora wasagana yamatath anawashya thira redi iwathkota bas rathaye gaman ganna sisun bahira ayata nirikshanaya wannata sakaskarana lesatath upades labadun athara daruwan aarakshaka his wasum rahithawa hiwasum palanda sisun yathurupadi magin prawahanaya karana demapiyantada polisiya idiriye ewannak nowannata tharaye awawadha kalaha.ee athara sisuwiyan ilakkakara ganimin pasal prawahana kala simawa thula adhika shabdhaya nikuthwana sayilansar bahirin sawikotagena anaga rangum pana tharuna pirisda eeta samagamiwa nawatha anawashya shabdhaya nikuth wana ema sayilansar iwathkota sakasa penwana lesada awawada kalaha.

ech. el. sunil shantha kaluthara madhyama wisheshakaluthara, waskaduwa, dediyawala shri sudarshanarama wiharasthanayata wasara 150 k sampurna wima nimiththen 150 weni wihara jayanthi punya mahothsawaya mama 17 wanida pawathwimata wiharadhipathi kaluthara pradeshaye pradhana sanghanayaka saha kheththara wihara parshawaye pradhana sanghanayaka shasthrapathi dediyawala thilakasiri na himiyo katayuthu yoda atha.agosthu 17 wanida sawasa 150 wani wihara jayanthi wahalkada wiwrutha kirima kotte shri kalyani samashri dharma maha sangha sabhawe wadabalana mahanayaka rukmale dharmawijayaloka wiharadhipathi aacharya iththapane dhammalankara anunayaka himiyan ha bellanwila rajamaha wiharadhikari shri jayawardhapura wishwa widyalaye kulapathi mahacharya bellanwila wimalarathana anunayaka himiyange pradhanathwayen sidukere.agosthu 18 da sita agosthu 27 dina dakwa dinapatha paswaru 6.30 sita rathri 8 dakwa wishesha bodhipuja saha aaradhitha wishesha dharma deshana rashiyak pawathwe.
